pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider OOO (2010, TV show)$(br2)Used as the base item and repair material for most OOO items$(br2)Used on the $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#cell_medal_programer)Cell Medal Programmer$(/l) to obtain medals for the Birth CLAWs$(br2)Gives one level of the Greeed effect for every stack in your inventory
